DataElement.preferredName: Emission Scan Image Acquisition Mode Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The setting on a positron emission tomography scanner that determines how the device will sense photon during image capture.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Device-In-Use Domain Emission scan Image Acquisition Mode
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to device-in-use._The usual mode of scanner operation in which a tracer's distribution throughout a subject is detected for subsequent processing into an image._The process by which an image is acquired or obtained._A particular functioning condition or arrangement.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to device-in-use.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to device-in-use.

Property.preferredDefinition: The usual mode of scanner operation in which a tracer's distribution throughout a subject is detected for subsequent processing into an image.:The process by which an image is acquired or obtained.:A particular functioning condition or arrangement.

Concepts.definition: The usual mode of scanner operation in which a tracer's distribution throughout a subject is detected for subsequent processing into an image.
The process by which an image is acquired or obtained.
A particular functioning condition or arrangement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released. AK 2020-6-11 Created for CDSIC aligned NCI Standard CRFs. ghd

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The process by which something is acquired or obtained._Mode; a particular functioning condition or arrangement._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The property of being measured and described using two orthogonal directions.

Concepts.definition: The property of being measured and described using two orthogonal directions.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The property of being measured and described using three orthogonal directions.

Concepts.definition: The property of being measured and described using three orthogonal directions.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Estimation of the difference in annihilation photon travel time from emission to detection within the imaging device to help localize the site of positron emission.

Concepts.definition: Estimation of the difference in annihilation photon travel time from emission to detection within the imaging device to help localize the site of positron emission.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2718366 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
